name: An ice encased mithril ring
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It increases the users constitution somewhat.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It has awesome armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration an average amount.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It increases the users cold resistance strongly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
